mapper.sql: id, user_id, acc_no, rela_user_id, rela_userlevel, wlbi_amnt, wlbao_amnt, rmb_amnt, caldate, cntflag, status, syscode, otherno, other_amnt, other_source, create_time, modify_time, operator,bsrate,sanhq,coin_name,coin_rate,coin_amnt,buy_in_out
mapper.insert: insert into acc_detail (user_id, acc_no, rela_user_id, rela_userlevel, wlbi_amnt, wlbao_amnt, rmb_amnt, caldate, cntflag, status, syscode, otherno, other_amnt, other_source, create_time, operator,bsrate,sanhq ) values (#{user_id}, #{acc_no}, #{rela_user_id}, #{rela_userlevel}, #{wlbi_amnt}, #{wlbao_amnt}, #{rmb_amnt}, now(), '1', #{status}, #{syscode}, #{otherno}, #{other_amnt}, #{other_source}, now(), #{operator},#{bsrate},#{sanhq} )

insert into acc_detail
user_id,
user_type,
acc_no,
rela_user_id,
rela_userlevel,
wlbi_amnt,
wlbao_amnt,
rmb_amnt,
caldate,
cntflag,
status,
syscode,
otherno,
other_amnt,
other_source,
create_time,
operator,
bsrate,
sanhq,
hash,
coin_name,
coin_rate,
coin_amnt,
buy_in_out,
remark1,
remark2,
remark3,
remark4,
remark5,
#{user_id},
#{user_type},
#{acc_no},
#{rela_user_id},
#{rela_userlevel},
#{wlbi_amnt},
#{wlbao_amnt},
#{rmb_amnt},
#{caldate},
#{cntflag},
#{status},
#{syscode},
#{otherno},
#{other_amnt},
#{other_source},
now(),
#{operator},
#{bsrate},
#{sanhq},
#{hash},
#{coin_name},
#{coin_rate},
#{coin_amnt},
#{buy_in_out},
#{remark1},
#{remark2},
#{remark3},
#{remark4},
#{remark5},
mapper.update:
update acc_detail
user_id = #{user_id},
acc_no = #{acc_no},
rela_user_id = #{rela_user_id},
rela_userlevel = #{rela_userlevel},
wlbi_amnt = #{wlbi_amnt},
wlbao_amnt = #{wlbao_amnt},
rmb_amnt = #{rmb_amnt},
caldate = #{caldate},
cntflag = #{cntflag},
`status `= #{status},
syscode = #{syscode},
otherno = #{otherno},
other_amnt = #{other_amnt},
other_source = #{other_source},
operator = #{operator},
bsrate = #{bsrate},
sanhq = #{sanhq},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update acc_detail set user_id = #{user_id}, acc_no = #{acc_no}, rela_user_id = #{rela_user_id}, rela_userlevel = #{rela_userlevel}, wlbi_amnt = #{wlbi_amnt}, wlbao_amnt = #{wlbao_amnt}, rmb_amnt = #{rmb_amnt}, caldate = #{caldate}, cntflag = #{cntflag}, `status `= #{status}, syscode = #{syscode}, otherno = #{otherno}, other_amnt = #{other_amnt}, other_source = #{other_source}, operator = #{operator}, bsrate = #{bsrate}, sanhq = #{sanhq} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select otherno,caldate,acc_type,acc_name,rmb_amnt,coin_name,coin_rate,coin_amnt,buy_in_out,remark1,create_time,id,hash,other_account from ( select a.id,a.otherno,substring(a.create_time,1,19)caldate,b.acc_type,b.acc_name,a.coin_name,a.coin_rate,a.buy_in_out,unix_timestamp(a.create_time)create_time,hash, case when a.rmb_amnt >0 and (a.buy_in_out = 2 or b.derection = '1') then CONCAT('+',round(a.rmb_amnt,2)) when a.rmb_amnt = 0 or a.rmb_amnt is null THEN '0' ELSE CONCAT('-',round(a.rmb_amnt,2)) END as rmb_amnt, case when a.coin_amnt >0 and (a.buy_in_out = 1 or a.rela_user_id = #{user_id}) then CONCAT('+',round(a.coin_amnt,2)) when a.coin_amnt = 0 or a.coin_amnt is null THEN '0' ELSE CONCAT('-',round(a.coin_amnt,2)) END as coin_amnt, case when a.buy_in_out = 1 then CONCAT(a.remark1,'RMB-HLB') when a.buy_in_out = 2 then CONCAT(a.remark1,'HLB-RMB') else a.remark1 END remark1, case when a.user_id = #{user_id} then a.remark3 when a.rela_user_id = #{user_id} then a.remark2 else '系统平台' end other_account from acc_detail a,acc_def b where 1=1 and (a.user_id = #{user_id} or a.rela_user_id = #{user_id}) and a.acc_no = b.acc_no
)t order by t.caldate desc

select otherno,caldate,acc_name,wlbi_amnt,wlbao_amnt,rmb_amnt,remark1,currency from ( select a.otherno,substring(a.create_time,1,19)caldate,b.acc_type,b.acc_name, case when a.wlbi_amnt >0 and b.derection = '1' then CONCAT('+',round(a.wlbi_amnt,2)) when a.wlbi_amnt = 0 or a.wlbi_amnt is null THEN'0' ELSE CONCAT('-',round(a.wlbi_amnt,2)) END as wlbi_amnt, case when a.wlbao_amnt >0 and b.derection = '1' then CONCAT('+',a.wlbao_amnt) when a.wlbao_amnt = 0 or a.wlbao_amnt is null THEN '0' ELSE CONCAT('-',a.wlbao_amnt) END as wlbao_amnt, case when a.rmb_amnt >0 and b.derection = '1' then CONCAT('+',round(a.rmb_amnt,2)) when a.rmb_amnt = 0 or a.rmb_amnt is null THEN '0' ELSE CONCAT('-',round(a.rmb_amnt,2)) END as rmb_amnt, a.remark1, case when a.wlbi_amnt <> 0 then '1' when a.wlbao_amnt <> 0 then '2' when a.rmb_amnt <> 0 then '3' end currency from acc_detail a,acc_def b where 1=1 and a.user_id = #{user_id} and a.acc_no = b.acc_no and a.`status` = '4'
and a.create_time >= #{startTime}
and date(a.create_time) <= #{endTime}
and b.acc_type = #{acc_type}
and b.acc_type in ('1','15','24')
and (a.wlbi_amnt >= #{startMoney} or a.wlbao_amnt >= #{startMoney} or a.rmb_amnt >= #{startMoney})
and (a.wlbi_amnt <= #{endMoney} or a.wlbao_amnt <= #{endMoney} or a.rmb_amnt <= #{endMoney})
and a.otherno = #{otherno}
and date(a.create_time) = date(now())
and a.create_time between date_sub(now(),interval 1 week) and now()
and a.create_time between date_sub(now(),interval 1 month) and now()
and a.wlbi_amnt <> 0
and a.wlbao_amnt <> 0
and a.rmb_amnt <> 0
and (a.wlbi_amnt <> 0 or a.wlbao_amnt <> 0 or a.rmb_amnt <> 0 )
and a.remark1 like concat('%', #{remark1}, '%')
)t order by t.caldate desc

SELECT CASE WHEN wlbi_amnt_total > 0 THEN CONCAT('+', wlbi_amnt_total) ELSE wlbi_amnt_total END wlbi_amnt_total, CASE WHEN wlbao_amnt_total > 0 THEN CONCAT('+', wlbao_amnt_total) ELSE wlbao_amnt_total END wlbao_amnt_total, CASE WHEN rmb_amnt_total > 0 THEN CONCAT('+', rmb_amnt_total) ELSE rmb_amnt_total END as rmb_amnt_total
FROM ( SELECT round(sum(wlbi_amnt),2) wlbi_amnt_total, round(sum(wlbao_amnt),4) wlbao_amnt_total, round(sum(rmb_amnt),2) rmb_amnt_total FROM ( select a.otherno,substring(a.create_time,1,19)caldate, case when a.wlbi_amnt >0 and b.derection = '1' then CONCAT('+',round(a.wlbi_amnt,2)) when a.wlbi_amnt = 0 or a.wlbi_amnt is null THEN'0' ELSE CONCAT('-',round(a.wlbi_amnt,2)) END as wlbi_amnt, case when a.wlbao_amnt >0 and b.derection = '1' then CONCAT('+',a.wlbao_amnt) when a.wlbao_amnt = 0 or a.wlbao_amnt is null THEN '0' ELSE CONCAT('-',a.wlbao_amnt) END as wlbao_amnt, case when a.rmb_amnt >0 and b.derection = '1' then CONCAT('+',round(a.rmb_amnt,2)) when a.rmb_amnt = 0 or a.rmb_amnt is null THEN '0' ELSE CONCAT('-',round(a.rmb_amnt,2)) END as rmb_amnt from acc_detail a,acc_def b where 1=1 and a.user_id = #{user_id} and a.acc_no = b.acc_no and a.`status` = '4'
and a.create_time >= #{startTime}
and date(a.create_time) <= #{endTime}
and b.acc_type = #{acc_type}
and b.acc_type in ('1','15','24')
and (a.wlbi_amnt >= #{startMoney} or a.wlbao_amnt >= #{startMoney} or a.rmb_amnt >= #{startMoney})
and (a.wlbi_amnt <= #{endMoney} or a.wlbao_amnt <= #{endMoney} or a.rmb_amnt <= #{endMoney})
and a.otherno = #{otherno}
and date(a.create_time) = date(now())
and a.create_time between date_sub(now(),interval 1 week) and now()
and a.create_time between date_sub(now(),interval 1 month) and now()
and a.wlbi_amnt <> 0
and a.wlbao_amnt <> 0
and a.rmb_amnt <> 0
and (a.wlbi_amnt <> 0 or a.wlbao_amnt <> 0 or a.rmb_amnt <> 0 )
and a.remark1 like concat('%', #{remark1}, '%')
) t1 ) t2
select acc_type,acc_name as description from acc_def where 1=1 and user_type like concat('%', #{user_type}, '%') and is_show = '1' GROUP BY acc_name ORDER BY id ASC
mapper.update: update user_wallet w, (select d1.user_id,SUM(d1.wlbi_amnt) smwlbi,sum(d1.wlbao_amnt) smwlbao,sum(d1.rmb_amnt) smrmb ,sum(d1.sanrelarmb_amnt)sumsanrelarmb from acc_detail d1 where d1.`status`='3' and d1.acc_no in(select acc_no from acc_def where sumflag = '1') group by d1.user_id) d set w.future_currency = w.future_currency+ ifnull(d.smwlbi,0), w.future_treasure =w.future_treasure+ifnull(d.smwlbao,0), w.money = w.money+ifnull(d.smrmb,0), w.sanrelarmb_amnt = w.sanrelarmb_amnt +IFNULL(d.sumsanrelarmb,0), w.modify_time =now() where w.user_id = d.user_id
update acc_detail set `status` ='4' , cntflag = 1, caldate = now() where 1=1 and acc_no in(select acc_no from acc_def where sumflag = '1') and `status` ='3'

update user_wallet w, (select d1.user_id,SUM(d1.wlbi_amnt) smwlbi,sum(d1.wlbao_amnt) smwlbao,sum(d1.rmb_amnt) smrmb ,sum(d1.sanrelarmb_amnt)sumsanrelarmb from acc_detail d1 where 1=1 and d1.acc_no in ('27','28') and otherno =#{pay_no} and status='9' group by d1.user_id) d set w.future_currency = w.future_currency+ ifnull(d.smwlbi,0), w.future_treasure =w.future_treasure+ifnull(d.smwlbao,0), w.money = w.money+ifnull(d.smrmb,0), w.sanrelarmb_amnt = w.sanrelarmb_amnt +IFNULL(d.sumsanrelarmb,0), w.modify_time =now() where w.user_id = d.user_id
update acc_detail set `status` ='4' , cntflag = 1, caldate = now() where 1=1 and acc_no in ('27','28') and `status` ='9' and otherno =#{pay_no}

update user_wallet w, (select d1.user_id,SUM(d1.wlbi_amnt) smwlbi,sum(d1.wlbao_amnt) smwlbao,sum(d1.rmb_amnt) smrmb ,sum(d1.sanrelarmb_amnt)sumsanrelarmb from acc_detail d1 where 1=1 and d1.acc_no in ('11') and otherno =#{user_id} and status='9' group by d1.user_id) d set w.future_currency = w.future_currency+ ifnull(d.smwlbi,0), w.future_treasure =w.future_treasure+ifnull(d.smwlbao,0), w.money = w.money+ifnull(d.smrmb,0), w.sanrelarmb_amnt = w.sanrelarmb_amnt +IFNULL(d.sumsanrelarmb,0), w.modify_time =now() where w.user_id = d.user_id
update acc_detail set `status` ='4' , cntflag = 1, caldate = now() where 1=1 and acc_no in ('11') and `status` ='9' and otherno =#{user_id}
mapper.insert: insert into acc_detail ( user_id,acc_no,rmb_amnt,user_type,cntflag,status,other_amnt, other_source, operator ) select a.user_id,'94',a.txamnt,b.user_type,0,1,a.txamnt, '实体店消费','sys' FROM pay_order a,store_info c, users_details b where 1=1 AND a.remark2 = c.store_id and c.user_id= b.id and a.pay_no=#{pay_no} and a.status='1' and a.fee_type='6'

insert into acc_detail (user_id,acc_no,rmb_amnt,user_type,cntflag,caldate,`status`,otherno,other_amnt,other_source,operator) select a.user_id,'09',c.cost_price,d.user_type,'1',now(),'4',b.shop_order_no,c.cost_price,'销售业绩（供应商）',d.mobile_phone from shop_supplier a ,shop_order_goods b ,shop_goods c,users_details d where 1=1 and a.id = b.supplier_id and b.goods_id = c.goods_id and a.user_id = d.id and b.shop_order_no = #{shop_order_no}
mapper.select: select a.otherno,a.acc_no,substring(a.create_time,1,19)caldate,a.wlbi_amnt,b.account from acc_detail a ,user_login b where 1=1 and a.rela_user_id = b.user_id and a.acc_no = '08' and a.user_id = #{user_id} order by a.create_time desc

insert into acc_detail(user_id,acc_no,rmb_amnt,user_type,cntflag,caldate,`status`,otherno,other_amnt,other_source,operator,create_time) select a.user_id,'07',a.txamnt,'','1',now(),'4',a.pay_no,a.txamnt,'人民币提现','',now() from pay_order a where 1=1 and a.fee_type = '2' and a.`status` = '1' and a.confirm_time is null
select `hash`,acc_no,otherno from acc_detail where `status` = '5' and cntflag = '0'
mapper.update:
update acc_detail set caldate = #{caldate} , cntflag = #{cntflag} , status = #{status} WHERE `hash` in
#{item}

update user_wallet w, (select d1.user_id,SUM(d1.wlbi_amnt) smwlbi from acc_detail d1
WHERE `hash` in
#{item}
group by d1.user_id) d set w.future_currency = w.future_currency+ ifnull(d.smwlbi,0) where w.user_id = d.user_id
mapper.select: select a.id,a.otherno,substring(a.create_time,1,19)caldate,b.acc_type,b.acc_name,a.coin_name,a.coin_rate,a.buy_in_out,unix_timestamp(a.create_time)create_time,hash, case when a.rmb_amnt >0 and (a.buy_in_out = 2 or b.derection = '1') then CONCAT('+',round(a.rmb_amnt,2)) when a.rmb_amnt = 0 or a.rmb_amnt is null THEN '0' ELSE CONCAT('-',round(a.rmb_amnt,2)) END as rmb_amnt, case when a.coin_amnt >0 and a.buy_in_out = 1 then CONCAT('+',round(a.coin_amnt,2)) when a.coin_amnt = 0 or a.coin_amnt is null THEN '0' ELSE CONCAT('-',round(a.coin_amnt,2)) END as coin_amnt, case when a.buy_in_out = 1 then CONCAT(a.remark1,'RMB-HLB') when a.buy_in_out = 2 then CONCAT(a.remark1,'HLB-RMB') else a.remark1 END remark1 , case when a.user_id = #{user_id} then a.remark3 when a.rela_user_id = #{user_id} then a.remark2 else a.remark3 end other_account from acc_detail a ,acc_def b where 1=1 and a.acc_no = b.acc_no and a.id = #{id}
